name: OddEyeSee
description:
Look out! 

You must hide in a sea of eyes so that the other players don't know where you are. Then copy what the other eyes are doing to blend in. Finally you get to poke anyone that you think didn't blend in. If you're left alive you win!

This game is a spectacle!

Art, Design, Development: @AntonTesh AnthonyTesija.com

Development: @kurtwaldo

Music, Sounds: @visagermusic Visager Bandcamp
